Sacrifice a Mountain. When you do, create a colorless Volcano land token with “{T}: Add {R}” and “{1}, {T}: This land deals 4 damage to any target.”
Swansong [i](Then you may exile this. If you do, you can't cast spells for the rest of the game, and at the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for swansong.)[/i]
